name: Merge a Saved Patch into the Base Theory
description: Tests SAVE_THEORY, RETRACT, and MERGE_THEORY to verify patches can be saved, facts removed, and patches merged back to restore state. Tests various merge scenarios.

theory.natural_language: We have robots and their components: RobotA uses BatteryX, RobotB uses BatteryY, DroneC uses MotorZ, and VehicleD uses FuelCell. We test save-retract-merge cycles for each.

queries.natural_language: After saving and retracting, is RobotA still using BatteryX?

expected_answer.natural_language: No. After retraction, the fact should not be present.
expected_answer.explanation: RETRACT removes the fact from the current session.

queries.natural_language: After merging the saved patch, does RobotA use BatteryX again?
queries.expected_dsl:
@merge MERGE_THEORY robot_patch
@q2 ASK RobotA USES BatteryX

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. MERGE_THEORY should bring back the saved fact.
expected_answer.explanation: MERGE_THEORY loads facts from robot_patch back into the store.

queries.natural_language: Save, retract, merge cycle for RobotB and BatteryY.

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. Complete cycle restores the fact.

queries.natural_language: After saving, can we verify the theory was saved successfully?
queries.expected_dsl:
@save3 SAVE_THEORY drone_patch
@q4 ASK DroneC USES MotorZ

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. The fact is still present after saving (save doesn't remove).
expected_answer.explanation: SAVE_THEORY preserves facts; fact remains accessible.

queries.natural_language: Now merge the drone patch and verify restoration.
queries.expected_dsl:
@merge3 MERGE_THEORY drone_patch
@q5 ASK DroneC USES MotorZ

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. Merging restores the DroneC fact.
expected_answer.explanation: MERGE_THEORY brings back the saved fact.

queries.natural_language: Verify VehicleD uses FuelCell without any retraction (baseline).

expected_answer.explanation: Baseline check - no retract means fact is present.

queries.natural_language: Save multiple patches and merge them in sequence.

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. First patch merged restores ServerE.
expected_answer.explanation: Multiple patches can be saved and merged selectively.

queries.natural_language: After merging laptop_patch, is LaptopF restored?
queries.expected_dsl:
@merge5 MERGE_THEORY laptop_patch
@q8 ASK LaptopF USES Battery

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. Second patch merged restores LaptopF.
